text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires identifying the relevant Moral Right for the failure to credit as the Right of Paternity (s.77 CDPA 1988). The candidate answer explicitly discusses Moral Rights, stating: 'Moral rights (right to be identified & to object to derogatory treatment)' and later under section 4, 'Moral\u2010right breach' it lists: 'Right to be identified (s. 77) \u2013 the ad gave no credit to you.' This directly identifies the Right of Paternity (Right to be identified) and cites the correct section (s. 77 CDPA 1988).", "criterion_id": "ca200bce-50d9-4e30-b9ed-2460dccd0c78"}
